A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Disney would have been better off making a story about Knights of the Old Republic. The Knights of the Old Republic CGI mini movie on Youtube\, is only 15 minutes long and it is by far more intriguing than this terrible mess. If I wanted an agenda smeared in my face\, I will go watch the news. If I wanted to watch crappy acting and terrible dialogue\, I will watch a house of commons debate.
